text: Arnold Martin Schwartzman OBE is a British film director known for his documentaries. In 1982 he won an Oscar for his most famous work, Genocide. His other works are Liberation (1994) and Echoes That Remain (1991). He is married to Isolde Schwartzman. Has designed advertisements for the Oscars for several years. Schwartzman studied at Canterbury College of Art, now University for the Creative Arts.
